mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ssp_report ( app_id, media_id, ssp_adslot_id, ssp_price, adx_adslot_id, adx_price, return_success_num, DATETIME, resource_type ) SELECT a.app_id, a.media_id, a.ssp_adslot_id, a.ssp_price, a.adx_adslot_id, a.adx_price, b.return_success_num, DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) , 0 FROM (SELECT ssp.id ssp_adslot_id, ssp.price ssp_price, adx.id adx_adslot_id, adx.floor_price adx_price, app.id app_id, app.media_id FROM adx_adslot adx, ssp_adslot ssp, adslot_relation ad, ssp_devicegroup d, ssp_app app WHERE ad.ssp_adslot_id = ssp.id AND ad.adx_adslot_id = adx.id AND adx.state = 1 AND ssp.status = 1 AND app.resource_type=0 AND ssp.ssp_devicegroup_id = d.id AND d.ssp_app_id = app.id) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT r.ssp_adslot_id, r.adx_adslot_id, SUM(r.return_success_num) return_success_num FROM adx_report r WHERE r.date_day = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY r.adx_adslot_id, r.ssp_adslot_id) b ON a.ssp_adslot_id = b.ssp_adslot_id AND b.adx_adslot_id = a.adx_adslot_id

SELECT d.adslot_id ssp_adslot_id, ROUND(SUM(d.ssp_adslot_price * d.num), 2) ssp_adslot_price, d.adx_adslot_id, ROUND(SUM(d.adx_adslot_price * d.num), 2) adx_adslot_price, SUM(d.estimate_pv) return_success_num, p.id app_id, p.media_id FROM pmp_order_detail d LEFT JOIN ssp_adslot a ON d.adslot_id = a.id LEFT JOIN ssp_devicegroup g ON a.ssp_devicegroup_id = g.id LEFT JOIN ssp_app p ON g.ssp_app_id = p.id WHERE d.put_time = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY d.adslot_id, d.adx_adslot_id
